30.ara-name: كتاب الوصايا عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Al-Harith narrated from 'Ali:"The Prophet (s.a.w) judged with the debt before the will, and you people recite the will before the debt

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ يُبْدَأُ بِالدَّيْنِ قَبْلَ الْوَصِيَّةِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been Related About Beginning With The Debt Before The Will
